correct_answer: Video games have evolved since the mid-20th century.
Pong and Space Invaders were simple, pixelated games.
Red Dead Redemption and Fortnite offer lifelike worlds.
Spacewar! was developed in 1962 at MIT.
retrieved_context: MIT is also known as Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Massachusetts Institute of Technology developed Spacewar!. Massachusetts Institute of Technology developed Spacewar!.

correct_answer: Atari 2600 brought arcade experience to homes.
Super Mario Bros. and The Legend of Zelda were iconic games in the 1980s.
Doom and Quake pushed boundaries in the 1990s.
Online gaming rose in the early 2000s.
VR and AR technologies have advanced gaming experiences.
AI, machine learning, and blockchain are revolutionizing the gaming industry.
Video games have responded to technological advancements and consumer preferences.
The future of video games promises new and exciting experiences.
